content.prompt: The excerpt best provides evidence about which of the following historical situations in the late 1840s?

choices.label: Increased conflict between urban immigrants and nativists
Compromises between the Supreme Court and national leaders
The expanding influence of the Northern abolitionist movement
Growing sectional tensions caused by the Mexican-American War

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
